dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems, consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of fashion items, designed as a drop-in replacement for MNIST, containing 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST
